name: mr.President Prologue
description:
Mr.President Prologue is a half-hour story about a fictional President of the country.

Somebody want to kill the President today... But mr.President has his own way to solve problems. Take control of the country ruler. Defeat all the enemies!

Real-time physics will make the every motion of your character unique... and funny.

Languages: English, Russian

Controls:

A/D - Walking

Shift + A/D - Running

Space - Jumping

C - Stand control

E (hold) - Use buttons/Open doors

Shift + E (hold) - Knock doors

LMB - Shooting

RMB - Aiming

R (hold) - Reloading

F (hold) - Take ammo from magazines

MMB - Toggle slow-motion

Mr.President Episode 1 is under development.
